bug.author: shantanuchhabra
bug.summary: API docs for Drawing Classifier don't show up on "Modelling" page
bug.description: While the API docs are there and show up when you search for them, they are not available as a direct link on <denchmark-link:https://apple.github.io/turicreate/docs/api/turicreate.toolkits.html>https://apple.github.io/turicreate/docs/api/turicreate.toolkits.html</denchmark-link>
